contact.name: Omar Mohamed Abozeid
contact.title: Student at Cairo University - Communication Engineering

education.degree: B.Sc. in Communication and Computer Engineering

projects.title: ALU System
projects.subtitle: Logic Design Project
projects.description: Designed and implemented an Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU) in both hardware and software. Demonstrated understanding of logic gates, digital circuits, and microarchitecture.

projects.title: Paint for Kids
projects.subtitle: C++ Programming Project
projects.description: Developed an interactive drawing program targeted for children using C++. Focused on user-friendly interface and basic graphics functionality.

projects.title: Ambulance and Hospital Simulation
projects.subtitle: Data Structures Project
projects.description: Built a system simulating ambulance dispatch and hospital intake using advanced data structures. Applied concepts like queues, stacks, and linked lists for real-time decision handling.

awards.title: Research Day at Cairo University
awards.description: Participated and won 3rd place in the research competition; awarded a certificate of recognition.

workshops.title: IEEE Digital Design Workshop
workshops.description: Participating in practical sessions focused on digital circuit design and simulation.
